descriptionList: Builderoo Developments Ltd is a construction company offering quality building solutions for both residential and comercial projects. Having operate in the market since 2005, our company is well equipped to undertake various construction works. The years of experience left us well equipped and sharpened all the necessary skills for entering projects as a flexible construction partner with a bespoke approach.
The company focuses 100% on scaffolding services, having no distractions and only using fully qualified and trained (to meet the latest health and safety standards) direct professionals.
